name: part_003
file: tmp_【 #桃鈴ねね誕生日Live2025 】ゲストあり！新衣装お披露目あり！ねねリズムバースデーライブ！【 桃鈴ねね ⧸ hololive 】 [d-Ua7CIU34I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene finishes her performance of 'Housou Code ga Nanbo no Monjai'.
scenes.song_name: Housou Code ga Nanbo no Monjai

scenes.description: Nene's MC section, discussing the previous song and introducing the upcoming collaboration segment.
Song selection screen via a game-like interface.
Costume selection and transformation into an idol outfit.
Momosuzu Nene and Usada Pekora perform the song 'Watch Me' together.

subtitles.original: （死ぬ時はみんな道連れネクロマンサー）
subtitles.english: (When we die, we're all necromancers going down together!)

subtitles.original: はーい！というわけで！
subtitles.english: Alright! So!

subtitles.original: 銀魂の寺門通ちゃんの曲で
subtitles.english: That was a song by Terakado Tsuu-chan from Gintama,

subtitles.original: 『放送コードがなんぼのもんじゃい』でしたー！
subtitles.english: 'Broadcasting Codes? Who Cares!'

subtitles.original: あぁ〜！
subtitles.english: Aaah!

subtitles.original: この曲ね、ピーばっかりで逆にね
subtitles.english: There's a theory that this song is actually

subtitles.original: 歌うのめっちゃ難しい説があったんですけど
subtitles.english: super hard to sing because it's full of bleeps,

subtitles.original: 絶対やりたい曲だったので
subtitles.english: but I really wanted to do it,

subtitles.original: 今日みんなと一緒に遊べて嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: so I'm happy I got to have fun with everyone today!

subtitles.original: はい、ちょっと水飲みます
subtitles.english: Alright, I'm gonna drink some water.

subtitles.original: お待たせしました！
subtitles.english: Sorry for the wait!

subtitles.original: さあ、でもでも！ここからは
subtitles.english: Now then! From here on,

subtitles.original: コラボパートに行こうと思うので
subtitles.english: we're moving into the collaboration part,

subtitles.original: ねねの息も整うはず！
subtitles.english: so Nene should be able to catch her breath!

subtitles.original: というわけで、コラボパート行ってみよう！
subtitles.english: So, let's head into the collaboration part!

subtitles.original: あー、次はどうする？
subtitles.english: Ah, what should we do next?

subtitles.original: えー、迷っちゃう！
subtitles.english: Eeh, I can't decide!

subtitles.original: えー、どうしようかな？
subtitles.english: Hmm, what should I pick?

subtitles.original: よし、この曲に決定！
subtitles.english: Alright, I've decided on this song!

subtitles.original: この曲はどの衣装で歌おうかな？
subtitles.english: Which outfit should I wear to sing this song?

subtitles.original: この衣装？
subtitles.english: This outfit?

subtitles.original: こっちの衣装もいいな
subtitles.english: This one's good too.

subtitles.original: この衣装？
subtitles.english: This outfit?

subtitles.original: うーん、この衣装に決定！
subtitles.english: Hmm, I'll go with this one!

subtitles.original: うわぁぁぁ！変身！
subtitles.english: Waaaah! Transform!

subtitles.original: Watch Me
subtitles.english: Watch Me

subtitles.original: 巡りあう糸はきっと
subtitles.english: The threads that meet by chance are surely

subtitles.original: 絡まるようになて
subtitles.english: becoming entangled

subtitles.original: リアルで感じる熱は
subtitles.english: The heat felt in reality

subtitles.original: 本物の誘惑
subtitles.english: is a genuine temptation

subtitles.original: ドキドキ高鳴る鼓動と一緒に速度が追いつけない
subtitles.english: My heart is pounding, and my speed can't keep up

subtitles.original: 視線の先に映る君がいて
subtitles.english: You are there, reflected in my gaze

subtitles.original: 目に見えないメロディが
subtitles.english: An invisible melody

subtitles.original: 弾けてる気がしたの
subtitles.english: feels like it's bursting

subtitles.original: ときめきはいつまでも変わらない夢の証でしょう
subtitles.english: This heartbeat is the proof of a dream that will never change

subtitles.original: 願い事集めてカラフルに彩ってくストーリー
subtitles.english: Gathering wishes to color a story vividly

subtitles.original: それじゃパッとキメポーズリズムに合わせて
subtitles.english: Now then, strike a pose perfectly to the rhythm

subtitles.original: Dance Dance 踊ろうよ踏み出して
subtitles.english: Dance Dance, let's dance, step out

subtitles.original: 天使のハートで見せつけていく
subtitles.english: Showing off with an angel's heart

subtitles.original: これでもうお友達
subtitles.english: Now we're already friends

subtitles.original: 最後はギュッとキメポーズリズムに合わせて
subtitles.english: Finally, strike a pose tight to the rhythm

subtitles.original: Dance Dance 踊ろうよ駆け抜け
subtitles.english: Dance Dance, let's dance, run through

subtitles.original: 天使の微笑みドキドキさせて
subtitles.english: An angel's smile, making hearts flutter

subtitles.original: これでもうお友達だね
subtitles.english: Now we're already friends, right?

subtitles.original: ダラダラしてたらお昼までスースー
subtitles.english: If we're lazy, we'll be snoozing until noon

subtitles.original: 寝不足ヘクトールお腹からグーグー
subtitles.english: Sleep-deprived Hector, stomach growling

subtitles.original: 待っててくれたキミにアンサー最後までアゲてこう
subtitles.english: An answer to you who waited, let's keep it up until the end

subtitles.original: ノッたりアゲたり案外ノンビリ悪くないねねねね中
subtitles.english: Riding, raising, surprisingly leisurely, not bad, in the middle of Nene-Nene

subtitles.original: ドキドキ重なる心心中まで追いつけない
subtitles.english: Our hearts overlap, can't keep up with the core

subtitles.original: いたずらに微笑む君がいて
subtitles.english: You are there, smiling mischievously

subtitles.original: 駆け足で届けたいの
subtitles.english: I want to deliver it at a run

subtitles.original: 魔法みたいにずっと
subtitles.english: Forever, like magic

subtitles.original: 友達はいつまでも忘れない想いを広げて
subtitles.english: Friends will never forget, spreading our feelings

subtitles.original: どこまでも続いてく同じ未来を見つめたい
subtitles.english: I want to gaze at the same future that continues everywhere

subtitles.original: きっと夢の中で描いた
subtitles.english: Surely, I drew it in my dreams

subtitles.original: この瞬間は君だけのために
subtitles.english: This moment is just for you

subtitles.original: 君の心と私の心の距離
subtitles.english: The distance between your heart and mine

subtitles.original: を繋ぐ糸
subtitles.english: is the thread connecting us

subtitles.original: 準備はOK？
subtitles.english: Are you ready?

subtitles.original: それじゃパッとあざとくポーズを合わせて
subtitles.english: Now then, strike a cute pose together

subtitles.original: Dance Dance 踊ろうよ輝いて
subtitles.english: Dance Dance, let's dance, shine bright

subtitles.original: 天使の言葉で虜にしていく
subtitles.english: Making you captive with an angel's words
